entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
